pages.title: Oysters
pages.text: Oysters can be found in Beach Biomes inside of the sand. $(br1)You can obtain one by right clicking an Oyster Sand block or breaking it.

pages.title: Oyster
pages.text: There are ways to obtain pearls from them, and Turtlemancers often use them for various reasons.

pages.title: Oyster Sand
pages.text: By cooking the oyster you lose the opportunity to get the pearl inside of it, but you earn a delicious food instead.
